definition: A season characterized by the transition from summer to winter, typically associated with falling leaves, cooler temperatures, and shorter daylight hours. It is commonly used to refer to the third season of the year in the Northern Hemisphere, occurring between summer and winter.

examples.german: Im Herbst f채rben sich die Bl채tter bunt.
examples.english: In autumn, the leaves change color.

examples.german: Im Herbst beginnt die Schule wieder.
examples.english: School starts again in the fall.

examples.german: Im Herbst gibt es viele Erntefeste.
examples.english: There are many harvest festivals in the autumn.

examples.german: Im Herbst wird es k체hler und die Tage werden k체rzer.
examples.english: In the fall, it gets cooler and the days get shorter.
